statements: SELECT * FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE id = 1;
SELECT external_data_source, ETL_process, risk_score FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE risk_score > 50;
SELECT id, external_data_source FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE industry_benchmarks IS NULL;
SELECT * FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 30 AND 70;
SELECT id, industry_benchmarks FROM RiskAnalysisData ORDER BY industry_benchmarks DESC;
SELECT * FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE risk_score > 50 ORDER BY industry_benchmarks ASC LIMIT 10;
SELECT id, external_data_source FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE ETL_process = 'Data Cleansing' ORDER BY id DESC;
SELECT id, risk_score, industry_benchmarks FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE risk_score >= 70 AND external_data_source = 'Third Party' ORDER BY risk_score DESC, industry_benchmarks ASC;
SELECT * FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE risk_score BETWEEN 40 AND 60 ORDER BY ETL_process DESC, industry_benchmarks ASC;
SELECT id, risk_score FROM RiskAnalysisData WHERE industry_benchmarks LIKE '%Finance%' ORDER BY risk_score ASC;
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources;
SELECT id, source_name, data_type, last_updated FROM external_data_sources;
SELECT source_name, data_type FROM external_data_sources ORDER BY last_updated DESC;
SELECT * FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_score > 0.5;
SELECT id, metric_name, industry_benchmark FROM risk_analysis WHERE industry_benchmark < 100.0;
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT source_name, data_type FROM external_data_sources ORDER BY source_name ASC;
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources WHERE data_type = 'Finance' AND last_updated > '2022-01-01';
SELECT id, risk_score FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_score > 0.5 ORDER BY risk_score DESC;
SELECT source_name, data_type, last_updated FROM external_data_sources WHERE data_type = 'Healthcare';
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources;
SELECT source_name, data_type FROM external_data_sources WHERE id = 1;
SELECT id, source_name, data_type, external_url FROM external_data_sources WHERE data_type = 'API';
SELECT * FROM etl_processes WHERE status = 'completed';
SELECT process_name, start_time, end_time FROM etl_processes ORDER BY start_time DESC;
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources WHERE data_type = 'Financial' ORDER BY source_name DESC
SELECT id, analysis_name, benchmarks FROM risk_analysis WHERE id IN (1, 3, 5)
SELECT process_name, start_time, end_time FROM etl_processes WHERE status = 'Completed' ORDER BY start_time ASC
SELECT source_name, data_type FROM external_data_sources WHERE source_name LIKE 'A%' AND data_type = 'Financial'
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources es JOIN etl_processes ep ON es.id = ep.id WHERE ep.status = 'Failed' ORDER BY es.source_name
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources;
SELECT source_name, source_type FROM external_data_sources WHERE source_id = 1;
SELECT MAX(source_id) AS max_source_id FROM external_data_sources;
SELECT * FROM industry_benchmarks ORDER BY benchmark_value DESC;
SELECT benchmark_name, benchmark_value FROM industry_benchmarks WHERE benchmark_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM external_data_sources;
SELECT source_id, source_name, source_type FROM external_data_sources WHERE source_type = 'API';
SELECT * FROM etl_processes WHERE process_type = 'Batch';
SELECT process_name, process_type, process_status FROM etl_processes WHERE process_status = 'Failed';
SELECT benchmark_name, benchmark_value FROM industry_benchmarks WHERE benchmark_value > 1000;
SELECT * FROM external_data_source;
SELECT id, source_name, data_type FROM external_data_source;
SELECT source_name, last_updated, data_type FROM external_data_source WHERE id = 1;
SELECT analysis_name, risk_score FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_score > 80;
SELECT MAX(risk_score) AS highest_risk_score FROM risk_analysis;
SELECT * FROM external_data_source
SELECT process_name, start_time, end_time, status FROM etl_processes WHERE status = 'completed'
SELECT benchmark_name, industry_type FROM industry_benchmarks ORDER BY benchmark_name DESC
SELECT source_id, benchmark_date, benchmark_result FROM benchmarks WHERE benchmark_date >= '2022-01-01'
SELECT analysis_name, risk_score, analysis_date FROM risk_analysis WHERE risk_score > 80 ORDER BY analysis_date ASC
